articles.title: Trump Signs Law Cracking Down on Fentanyl Trafficking
articles.description: President Donald Trump signed the Halt All Lethal Trafficking of Fentanyl Act, aiming to permanently classify fentanyl-like substances among the most dangerous drugs and increase penalties for traffickers.

articles.title: Astronomers Discover Early Signs of Planet Formation Around Young Star
articles.description: NASA and the European Southern Observatory unveiled evidence of planetary formation around the young star HOPS-315, providing an unprecedented snapshot of the early stages of solar system development.
